{"id":839090403,"question_id":724,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1667873949,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/839090403/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"53.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int pivotIndex(int[] nums) {\n        \n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        \n        int right =0;\n        for(int i=1; i<len; i++){\n            right+=nums[i];\n        }\n        \n        int left = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            \n            // System.out.println(left + \", \" + right);\n            \n            if(left==right)\n                return i;\n            \n            left+=nums[i];\n            if(i+1<len)\n                right-= nums[i+1];\n            \n            \n        }\n        \n        return -1;\n        \n        \n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
